public class  DefaultGraphNodeRenderer
     extends java.lang.Object

     public DefaultGraphNodeRenderer();

          // Methods 1
     public FigNode getFigNodeFor(GraphModel, Layer, Object);
}

An interface for FigNode factories. Similiar in concept to the Swing class TreeCellRenderer. This Default class asks the NetNode to make its own FigNode.

See Also: presentationFor, uci.graph.demo.WordNodeRenderer
